author: schneiml
body:
Changes from #17089 plus more:

- Improve Pixel Maps
- Fix some config files related to Phase0/Phase1 switching (online/development only)
- Fix a bug in the online fileinputsource which was inefficient/broken for huge datasets
- Fix SiPixelPhase1TrackEfficiency as suggested by Vincenzo
- Add a commit forgotten in the last PR related to the RawData plugin
- Improve performance by relaxing an over-strict check (Update: removed, not ready yet)

Should go into pre3.
@fioriNTU @enochnotsocool @davidcarbonis
title: Phase1 Pixel DQM PixelMaps, new TrackEfficiencies, removed Harvesting, new Plots and various Bugfixes
